name: Transcode Nag
description: Intelligently nags users when they transcode due to unsupported formats/codecs, while allowing bitrate-based transcoding without harassment.
overview: Smart transcoding monitor that only nags for format/codec incompatibility

versions.changelog:
"## What's Changed

- Fix: Include configPage.html as embedded resource (6c19123)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/voc0der/jellyfin-transcode-nag/compare/v1.0.1.7...v1.0.1.8
"

"## What's Changed

- Fix: Remove 'v' prefix from manifest versions to prevent plugin page crash (06bc04a)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/voc0der/jellyfin-transcode-nag/compare/v1.0.1.6...v1.0.1.7
"

"## What's Changed

- Fix nullable pattern in session activity (f034f18)
- Add login nag tracking and event kinds (e740dfa)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/voc0der/jellyfin-transcode-nag/compare/v1.0.1.5...v1.0.1.6
"

"## What's Changed

- Use DI Correct typing. (2a2eced)
- Fix: Use MediaBrowser.Model.Session namespace for TranscodeReason (015a35c)
- Fix: Add Jellyfin.Data package reference for TranscodeReason type (828f9bc)
- Refactor login nag to use week/month dropdown and template placeholders (1c7726f)
- Add login nag feature with transcode history tracking (5c6a96c)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/voc0der/jellyfin-transcode-nag/compare/v1.0.1.4...v1.0.1.5
"

"## What's Changed

- Fix: Use IHostedService instead of IServerEntryPoint (6ee2f90)
- Refactor: Switch from polling to event-driven playback monitoring (f75d62b)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/voc0der/jellyfin-transcode-nag/compare/v1.0.1.3...v1.0.1.4
"

"## What's Changed

- Fix: Nag once per video instead of once per login session (54559f5)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/voc0der/jellyfin-transcode-nag/compare/v1.0.1.2...v1.0.1.3
"

"## What's Changed

- Fix: Pass session ID to SendMessageCommand (6fa387a)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/voc0der/jellyfin-transcode-nag/compare/v1.0.1.1...v1.0.1.2
"

"## What's Changed

- Use jq for manifest.json updates (1bc7745)
- Fix: Use temporary Python file instead of inline heredoc (737fc3d)
- Fix: Correct Python heredoc in release workflow (375957b)
- Add Jellyfin plugin repository support with proper versioning (38ce74a)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/voc0der/jellyfin-transcode-nag/compare/v1.0.1...v1.0.1.1
"

Initial release
- Smart detection using TranscodeReasons API
- Configurable messages and intervals
- Web UI configuration page
- Background monitoring service
